FuncDef:
The restore enable command enables the switchback function for a Smart Link group.
The undo restore enable command disables the function. The restore enable command enables the switchback function for a Smart Link group. The undo restore enable command disables the function. By default, the switchback function is disabled for a Smart Link group. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
ExtraInfo: If the primary link in a Smart Link group fails, traffic automatically switches to the secondary link. The primary link remains blocked after it recovers to ensure uninterrupted traffic forwarding. To switch traffic back to the primary link, run the restore enable command to enable the switchback function for the Smart Link group. Traffic automatically switches back to the primary link after the switchback delay expires.
